meanings.definition: The quality or state of being obtrusive.
meanings.sent1: Her obtrusivenesses made it hard for others to focus.
meanings.sent2: The obtrusivenesses of his behavior made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The obtrusivenesses of the bright neon sign was almost comical in the quiet neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The obtrusivenesses of the loud music pierced through the peaceful night.
meanings.sent5: The obtrusivenesses of the glaring mistake was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The act of imposing oneself or one's ideas on others in an intrusive way.
meanings.sent1: His constant obtrusivenesses in meetings annoyed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her obtrusivenesses in trying to control every situation.
meanings.sent3: The obtrusivenesses of the salesperson trying to push products on customers was off-putting.
meanings.sent4: The obtrusivenesses of the politician's campaign tactics left a lasting impact on the voters.
meanings.sent5: The obtrusivenesses of the overbearing boss stifled creativity in the workplace.
